title: Jobs Numbers, 2020 Climate Strategy
itunes:title: Jobs Numbers, 2020 Climate Strategy
description:
Guests: Wendy Benjaminson, Bloomberg News Politics Editor and Miranda Green, Congressional reporter at the Hill.

Mandy Gunasekara, former Trump Administration EPA deputy assistant administrator discussed climate proposals from the democratic presidential candidates and the legal battle between the Trump administration and California over auto emissions.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
